header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Senior Scala software engineer with 6+ years of experience specializing in functional programming and distributed systems architecture. Proven expertise building scalable streaming data platforms, event-driven microservices, and high-performance backend systems using advanced functional programming concepts including monads, type classes, and category theory. Strong AWS cloud experience with Docker containerization and enterprise-scale system design serving millions of users.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a critical Scala-based streaming data platform serving 50+ engineering teams across Disney+ and Hulu, processing millions of real-time events through AWS Kinesis streams with advanced functional programming patterns and zero-downtime requirements

Built a comprehensive stream-snapshot state management system in Scala for aggregating large data streams, integrated into the Disney+ content metadata unification project processing millions of entertainment entities

Developed robust schema registry tools supporting backwards-compatible evolution using AWS Smithy and Scala functional validation pipelines, ensuring safe deployments across distributed services with complex type safety guarantees and semantic versioning

Implemented a multi-language artifact generation pipeline using the Scala Cats library, supporting Scala, Java, Python, and Protobuf with automated JSON serialization using Circe, functional composition patterns, and Scala equality type-classes

Designed sophisticated REST APIs using http4s and Cats Effect with Docker containerization for AWS deployment, implementing asynchronous processing and functional error handling for a production microservices architecture

Engineered real-time data-lake integrations using Spark and Scala for analytics workflows, implementing functional reactive programming principles for streaming data processing and transformation pipelines

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core runtime components for a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala and Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms with functional state management and peer-to-peer networking protocols for supply chain verification
Built a comprehensive HTTP management API using Akka HTTP for secure cryptographic key rotation, transaction signing, and node configuration

Created a high-performance transaction streaming service using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with functional asynchronous processing, implementing a Protobuf API enabling real-time blockchain data querying with immutable data structures
Developed end-to-end API tests using Postman collections to validate builds in the CI/CD process and provide example documentation to end-users

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack solutions for a construction project management platform serving thousands of users, implementing event-sourced change management architecture with functional programming principles for immutable state transitions and complex organizational workflows
Architected a cutting-edge event-sourced change management interface with complete audit trails, storing all user interactions as immutable events with functional state derivation patterns

Built a sophisticated change order tracking system with financial lineage features and cross-entity referencing, integrated with the company's flagship enterprise resource management application using Kafka message channels

Implemented a microservices architecture using C# deployed on Azure cloud infrastructure with MSSQL and Event Store databases, spanning database modeling, REST APIs, and responsive web UI components with functional composition principles

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed comprehensive test automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define and execute complex test scenarios using functional composition patterns and simple C# interfaces
Built an API testing framework for microservices validation and Selenium-based UI testing framework for headless and browser-based test execution with property-based testing principles

Conducted performance testing and load testing analysis including bulk operations to ensure system scalability and responsiveness under high concurrent user loads, establishing quality assurance processes for production systems
